message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it!
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer!  I'm really interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget.  Would you be willing to come down to $105?
I understand you're on a budget, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we settle on $135?
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $135 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $115. What do you think?
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $130?

Alice, I really appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $130 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable spending. I'm happy to pay $120, which is still a fair price for both of us. What do you say?
I've already mentioned that I need to get at least $120 for the product, Bob. I'm not willing to go any lower than that. I'm willing to make one last offer: $125. That's the lowest I can go.
